response.original_title: Stone & Spirit: The Colonial Churches of Nevis
response.overview: This documentary delves into the rich history of Nevis' early colonial churches and their profound influence on the island's cultural and social evolution. It explores the arrival of English settlers, the establishment of Anglican churches, and the role of enslaved Africans, Jewish merchants, and Methodist missionaries in shaping religious life. Through archival imagery, interviews, and compelling narration, this documentary offers an insightful look at how Nevis' religious foundations continue to shape its identity today.
response.title: Stone & Spirit: The Colonial Churches of Nevis
